<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="utf-8" />
  <title>#(title) | Acronyms</title>
</head>
<body>
  <h1>Acronyms</h1>

  #if(acronyms) {
    <table>
      <thead>
        <tr>
        </tr>
      </thead>
      <tbody>
        #for(acronym in acronyms) {
          <tr><td><a href="/acronyms/#(acronym.id)">#(acronym.short)</a></td><td>#(acronym.long)</td></tr>
        }
      </tbody>
    </table>
  } else if (whatever(5))
    <h2>testing logic</h2>
  } else {
    <h2>There aren't any acronyms yet!</h2>
  }
</body>
</html>
